section.name: Unit 3 Awareness Building: Cultural Competence and Inclusion
section.summary:
This unit will provide an overview of cultural competence and inclusion. By the end of this section, you will be able to:

  • Describe the six points of the cultural proficiency continuum.
  • Determine their individual level of cultural competence.
  • Conduct an evaluation of classroom inclusiveness.
  • Articulate an action step toward cultural competence and inclusion.

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to begin Unit 4, “Awareness Building: The Many Forms of Bias”
